metrics_conclusion: Superstar Saga - Popple and Rookie has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Superstar Saga - Popple and Rookie has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Major,  and C Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
